doc.title: Fully Clothed Bathing Beauties
doc.plot: Mirrel and Zeta lose their ball in the sea with Mirrel in a white dress and Zeta in skirt and top. Maid Dawn and mistress Gill draw pistols in a fun sequence in a school changing room and large pool. Maree is taken short in the countryside and wets her knickers. A very sultry Louise in the shower wearing a silver grey skirt and braless white cotton blouse and the lovely Kate gets soaked again.
